The above procedure gives the following values for the binding of indomethacin at pH 7.4: α-CD, 180; α-CD2NSc, 360; β- CD, 620; /8-CD<sub>2</sub>NSc, 1900.


Note that the provided text does not contain explicit bioactivity metrics like IC50, Ki, Kd, EC50, etc. with specific numeric values and units. The extracted sentence contains a binding constant value, but it does not have a unit. If you would like to extract sentences with other types of metrics, please let me know.
